channel.title: How do i set max players on hellzend?
channel.description: :mad: i tryed to modifie this ~> [code] public static int MaxConnections = 10;[/code] but there is still 145 players online could someone give me the real code to set a player limit or even give some help ?!

item.title: How do i set max players on hellzend?
item.dc:creator: @Tyrael Tyrael
item.description:
@Tyrael wrote:

Ram doesn’t always affect player ammout.
If you have good ram, and horrible internet. Your not going to be able to hold a lot of players
-tyrael-

Read full topic
item.source: How do i set max players on hellzend?

item.title: How do i set max players on hellzend?
item.dc:creator: @Zaron Zaron
item.description:
@Zaron wrote:

1337haxaz:

no they arent nulls everytime i register my server it goes in the first servers on status and everybody come on it … then it lags me as hell . for the moment i only have 500 mb rams . so it will explode my computer

Wow, then why are you hosting a server with only 500 Mbs of RAM? That’s like lag with 1 player online! Get 2 GBs of RAM, it has no lag and usually can hold that much players (if you got a good enough computer)

Read full topic
